fotoshop.Events

Class EventController

  • java.lang.Object
    • fotoshop.Events.EventController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class EventController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
    Main controller for the fotoshop software. Makes use of the property change events, and listeners to receive user user interface events from the GUI menu objects and passed Commands to the Editor.

    propertyChange() listener receives propertyChangeEvents from the GUI components and passes a Command to the Editor object. Also receives events from the Editor after property changes and calls the associated update method in the GUI.

    See Also:
    EventController(), setEditor(fotoshop.Editor), setGUI(fotoshop.GUI.GUI), propertyChange(java.beans.PropertyChangeEvent)
